>@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.DR8JvF0xiwsXggxj]{Expertise Talent}

ou have a knack for using, repairing, and learning about enchanted gear, especially objects with which you become familiar. In a process that takes 1 minute, you can use Bluff, Diplomacy, or Intimidate in place of Mysticism to identify a magic item without simultaneously casting detect magic. When you regain your Resolve Points after resting, you can designate a number of magic items and/or hybrid items that you’ve had in your possession for at least 24 hours to be your attuned items. Once per day per item, you can repair one of your attuned items as a full action, for which you can use Engineering in place of Mysticism.
